column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Make a Wrist Roller Out of PVC
#Text=A wrist roller works well for exercise .
#Text=You can use PVC to make one through a fairly intermediate , yet worthy process .
#Text=It takes a lot of care and concentration and will be rewarding .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Cut the PVC pipe .
#Text=Take the pipe and cut it to a desirable length with a hacksaw .
#Text=This will be your bar and should be long enough to complete the exercise .
#Text=Cut straight across , perpendicular to the pipe .
#Text=You can sand the ends if you 'd like , but this is not necessary .
#Text=Do n't panic if you do n't have a hacksaw .
#Text=PVC is a very soft material , so you could get away with many other options .
#Text=Drill the hole for the rope .
#Text=Insert the drill bit into the drill slightly larger than the rope in order to thread the rope through .
#Text=Drill the hole through one side of the PVC pipe only in the center of the pipe .
#Text=Thread the rope through the hole .
#Text=Push your rope through until it comes out one of the ends of the PVC .
#Text=Tie the knot once the end of the rope is out .
#Text=Knot the rope to create a loop at the end and thread the end back through , then pull the rope tight .
#Text=Cut the excess rope off if you 'd like .
#Text=Pull the knot back until it reaches the hole you drilled .
#Text=The knot should be big enough that it does not come out this hole .
#Text=Attach weights .
#Text=Take the other end of the rope and loop it through the hole in the center of the weights .
#Text=Then tie a knot in order to hold the weights .
#Text=A double knot will do fine ; this is the same as the knot before but you 'll have to go through the loop twice this time .
#Text=Test your knots .
#Text=Now that everything is together , lift your weights off the ground by lifting the bar up to see if the knots hold .
#Text=If the rope snaps , you need a thicker rope .
#Text=If the knot slips , you have too much weight and you will need a different knot ( doubling up knots will make them stronger )
#Text=It is unlikely that the PVC will bend , but you could use galvanized iron pipe if it does .
#Text=It will just take more effort to drill and cut , but still doable with the same tools and method .
#Text=If everything holds , you 've just made your very own wrist roller !
#Text=Be proud and enjoy it .
#Text=Tips
#Text=You could substitute the weights with anything you want as long as you can tie it to the end of the rope .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Use caution working with drills and hacksaws .
#Text=Things
#Text=You 'll Need
#Text=PVC pipe ( 1 " diameter is a good size )
